page.original:
&ltTBL>.ADD_BLANK_RECORDS() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltTBL>.ADD_BLANK_RECORDS( Num_Records as N ) ArgumentDescription Result_Flag .T. = Records were added.
.F. = Records were not added. Num_RecordsThe integer number of records to add.
Description The &ltTBL>.ADD_BLANK_RECORDS() method adds Num_Records of blank records to a table. Example This script adds 1,000 blank records to a table. dim t as P t = table.open("test") t.add_blank_records(1000)
See Also Table Functions and Methods
